details: The script uses GPW (Generalized Pseudopotential and Wavefunction) for the simulation.
It utilizes OpenMPI for MPI communication, and Intel compilers for optimized performance.
GCC is used as a base compiler for some packages.
Spack and Conda are package managers for dependency management.
SLURM is a workload manager for scheduling the job on the cluster.
UCX is a high-performance communication library.
HDF5 and NetCDF are libraries for handling large datasets.
The script requires significant CPU resources for the simulation.
It requires a substantial amount of memory for the calculations.
The script utilizes the network for MPI communication.
The script uses storage for input files, output results, and intermediate data.
